relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There is all type of clubs from the most traditional to the most uncommon! I guarantee you, you will find the perfect club(s) for you!
Rebel night, is a dance and at 12 everyone run and go to the big fountain at the center of the campus
All kind of events. Game, parties, barbecue, free stuff!! And everybody likes free stuff!
Food it's little bit expensive but there is a great variety of food so I think it's worth it
I don't live on campus but the events are pretty cool.
As an any institution some teachers are more strict than others, but besides that Dixie College always try to motivate students to enjoy study.
Don't miss class. Talk/ meet your professors so you journey will be more friendly. Talk with your adviser, they are there to help the students.
It's has teachers caring about how well their students are doing. Excellent place to learn and make some friends. Have all the tools a student needs to succeed.
pageTitle: Dixie State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {124245=When applying for Dixie apply before March 1st (that is when their academic scholarship deadline is). Take advantage of their free tutoring for every subject. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Dixie is awesome for students who live in St. George(or near by) who don't wish to go to a costly large university and just want to stay local. This school is also great for those that wish to get into the Nursing field because of the school's amazing Nursing program. Another awesome part of the medical programs at the school is if you wish to transfer to say the University of Utah, acceptance of those students are way high, because the University of Utah knows of Dixie's excellent teaching and wish for those students to come. The list goes on and on. Tips for prospective students For tips, make sure to go to Dixie events and other out of class activities, it is really the best way to get the best out of your college experience, you can always have fun at Dixie, you just need to put yourself out their to see it. Bang for the buck The amazing thing about Dixie State College is for the fact of it being so cheap as a College. Tuition for a full schedule of classes, per semester is only around $ 2,000, which is quite impressive for a College, everyone has a chance here at Dixie. Will enjoy being here
